Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,30 @@
+import React from "react";
+import { Card, Row, Col, Spin, Layout, Modal, Image } from 'antd';
+
+const { Content } = Layout;
+
+const Introduce = () => {
+	return (
+		<Layout style={{ backgroundColor: '#01050B' }}>
+			<Content style={{ display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center' }}>
+
+				<Image
+          alt="img"
+          src="/resources/images/introduce.png" // 背景图路径
+          preview={false} // 禁用预览
+          style={{
+            position: 'absolute',
+            top: 0,
+            left: 0,
+            right: 0,
+            bottom: 0,
+            objectFit: 'cover', // 确保图片覆盖整个区域
+            zIndex: -1 // 确保背景图在其他内容后面
+          }}
+        />
+			</Content>
+		</Layout>
+	);
+};
+
+export default Introduce;
\ No newline at end of file

--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+import React from "react";
+import { Layout, Image } from 'antd';
+
+const { Content } = Layout;
+
+const Introduce = () => {
+    return (
+        <Layout style={{ backgroundColor: '#01050B', position: 'relative', height: '100vh' }}>
+            <Content style={{ position: 'relative', height: '100%' }}>
+                <Image
+                    preview={false}
+                    alt="img"
+                    src="/resources/images/introduce.png"
+                    style={{
+                        position: 'absolute',
+                        top: 0,
+                        left: 0,
+                        width: '100%',
+                        height: '100%',
+                        objectFit: 'cover' // 确保图片覆盖整个区域
+                    }}
+                />
+            </Content>
+        </Layout>
+    );
+};
+
+export default Introduce;
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,27 @@
+import React from "react";
+import { Layout,Image } from 'antd';
+
+const { Content } = Layout;
+
+const Introduce = () => {
+    return (
+        <Layout style={{ backgroundColor: '#01050B', position: 'relative', height: '100vh' }}>
+            <Content style={{ position: 'relative', height: '100%' }}>
+                <Image
+                    alt="img"
+                    src="/resources/images/introduce.png" // 确保路径正确
+                    style={{
+                        position: 'absolute',
+                        top: 0,
+                        left: 0,
+                        width: '100%',
+                        height: '100%',
+                        objectFit: 'cover' // 确保图片覆盖整个区域
+                    }}
+                />
+            </Content>
+        </Layout>
+    );
+};
+
+export default Introduce;
\ No newline at end of file
